---
title: "Plotting functions"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(lineaGT)
library(patchwork)
```

```{r}
data(x.example)
x.example
```


# Scatterplot
```{r}
plots = plot_scatter_density(x.example)
plots$`cov.t1.l1:cov.t2.l2` # to visualize a single plot
```


# Marginal distributions
```{r}
plot_marginal(x.example) %>% patchwork::wrap_plots(nrow=2, guides="collect")
```


# Mullerplot
```{r warning=FALSE}
plot_mullerplot(x.example, which="frac", wrap=T)
```

```{r warning=FALSE}
plot_mullerplot(x.example, which="pop", wrap=T)
```
